articles.author: Mathieu Pollet
articles.title: Spain and UK warn against sending cluster bombs to Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: US decision to send the weapons has raised humanitarian concerns.
articles.content:
Madrid and London do not look kindly on the American decision to send cluster bombs to Ukraine.
The Biden administration announced on Friday that the weapons will be included in the U.S.’s next $800… [+1814 chars]

articles.title: Climate change is helping this new deadly virus to spread across Europe - Euronews
articles.description: Warmer temperatures are transforming Europe into the perfect habitat for ticks carrying CCHF, a deadly virus which in the worst cases results in death.
articles.content:
Warmer temperatures are transforming Europe into the perfect habitat for ticks carrying CCHF, a deadly virus which in the worst cases results in death.
